sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './Benchmarks.css' import { Button, Form } from 'semantic-ui-react' class Benchmarks extends Component { state = { updateModeOn: false, deadlift: this.props.deadlift, strict_press: this.props.strict_press, clean_and_jerk: this.props.clean_and_jerk, backsquat: this.props.backsquat, snatch: this.props.snatch } toggleUpdateMode = () => { this.setState({ updateModeOn: !this.state.updateModeOn }) } handleInputChange = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: parseInt(e.target.value)}) } render() { const { updateModeOn, deadlift, strict_press, clean_and_jerk, backsquat, snatch } = this.state return ( <> ); } } export default Benchmarks;
